SEARCH
Package org.flag4j.linalg

Class TensorNorms

java.lang.Object
org.flag4j.linalg.TensorNorms
public class TensorNorms extends Object
Utility class for computing "norms" of tensors.

  • Method Details

    • infNorm

      public static double infNorm(RealDenseTensorBase<?,?> src)
      Computes the infinity norm of a tensor, matrix, or vector. That is, the largest absolute value.
      Parameters:
      src - The tensor, matrix, or vector to compute the norm of.
      Returns:
      The infinity norm of the source tensor, matrix, or vector.

    • infNorm

      public static double infNorm(ComplexDenseTensorBase<?,?> src)
      Computes the infinity norm of a tensor, matrix, or vector. That is, the largest value by magnitude.
      Parameters:
      src - The tensor, matrix, or vector to compute the norm of.
      Returns:
      The infinity norm of the source tensor, matrix, or vector.

    • norm

      public static double norm(Tensor src)
      Computes the 2-norm of this tensor as if the tensor was a vector (i.e. as if by VectorNorm(Tensor.toVector())). This is equivalent to norm(src, 2).
      Parameters:
      src - Tensor to compute norm of.
      Returns:
      the 2-norm of this tensor.

    • norm

      public static double norm(Tensor src, double p)
      Computes the p-norm of this tensor.
      Parameters:
      src - Tensor to compute norm of.
      p - The p value in the p-norm.
      - If p is inf, then this method computes the maximum/infinite norm.
      Returns:
      The p-norm of this tensor.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If p is less than 1.

    • norm

      public double norm(CTensor src)
      Computes the 2-norm of this tensor. This is equivalent to norm(src, 2).
      Returns:
      the 2-norm of this tensor.

    • norm

      public double norm(CTensor src, double p)
      Computes the p-norm of this tensor.
      Parameters:
      src - Tensor to compute norm of.
      p - The p value in the p-norm.
      - If p is inf, then this method computes the maximum/infinite norm.
      Returns:
      The p-norm of this tensor.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If p is less than 1.

    • infNorm

      public double infNorm(CTensor src)
      Computes the maximum/infinite norm of this tensor.
      Parameters:
      src - Tensor to compute norm of.
      Returns:
      The maximum/infinite norm of this tensor.

      Parameters:

      p - The p parameter of the Lp norm.
      Returns:
      The Lp norm of the tensor.

    • tensorNormL2

      public static double tensorNormL2(CNumber[] src)
      Computes the L2 norm of a tensor (i.e. the Frobenius norm).
      Parameters:
      src - Entries of the tensor.
      Returns:
      The L2 norm of the tensor.
